AUTHOR: Pwnulatr
INSTALL_MSG:
Successfully installed the cog.
use `[p]help` to see the commands for conversion under `UnitConverter`
NAME: UnitConverter
SHORT: Converts units of measurement. DOES NOT SUPPORT DECIMALS YET.
DESCRIPTION:
Converts different units of measurement. Currently does not support decimal points. 
Temperature 
Speed 
Data 
Length (Partially)
